mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GREENUSERS ( USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, USERBIRTH, EMAIL, INDATE ) VALUES ( #{ userid }, #{ passwd }, #{ username }, #{ userbirth }, #{ email }, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(USERBIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERBIRTH, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INDATE FROM GREENUSERS ORDER BY USERID
SELECT USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, TO_CHAR(USERBIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERBIRTH, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INDATE FROM GREENUSERS WHERE USERID = #{ userid }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GREENUSERS WHERE USERID = #{ userid }
